name: ext_R5_Evidence_variableDefinition
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.Evidence.variableDefinition for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents Evidence.variableDefinition from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Evidence|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: Evidence variable such as population, exposure, or outcome
element.definition: `Evidence.variableDefinition` has no related element in R4:Evidence
